WorkItem.Description: Hunters can not change different pets from cat. Surv hunters normally use a wolf to receive their furious howl buff. The buffs 320 ranged AP. for 20 secs on a 40 sec cooldown. Also having an issue with basic stats. I loaded my gear from the armory and on the WoW armory website. all the numbers on stats are to low in the Rawr program the only numbers that are right is my hit rating and crit rating.
